thread.title: Riley Day incredible Nitro Athletics performance, Aussie 16-year-old - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Riley Day incredible Nitro Athletics performance, Aussie 16-year-old - Yahoo7

author: Sam Goodwin
title: Riley Day incredible Nitro Athletics performance, Aussie 16-year-old - Yahoo7
text:
Share Riley Day incredible Nitro Athletics performance, Aussie 16-year-old - Yahoo7 Aussie 16-year-old Riley Day is being tipped as a superstar in the making after only finishing behind a former world champion in the Nitro Athletics 100 metres. Close Riley Day's stunning 100m sprint UP NEXT VIDEO Riley Day's stunning 100m sprint. Source: Channel 7 Riley Day's stunning 100m sprint 
Day ran against Usain Bolt in the mixed relay on the opening night of Nitro last Saturday, and she was back in action on Thursday. 
Against a star-studded field including Jamaica's 2015 world champion Natasha Morrison, Day stormed home in 11.71 to finish second. Day in action. Image: Getty 
The remarkable run drew praise from Olympian Tamsyn Lewis. 
"She deals with pressure very well for a 16-year-old doesn't she?" Lewis said in commentary. 
"There's still work to be done but she's young and full of confidence." Close Bolt All Stars win controversial 4x100m UP NEXT VIDEO Bolt All Stars win controversial 4x100m. Vid: 7Mate Bolt All Stars win controversial 4x100m 
Fellow commentator Bruce McAvaney was also impressed. 
"Riley Day's back-end of the 100 was awesome!" he said. 
"It just shows what a great young prospect she is." Close Cheeky Brit blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss UP NEXT VIDEO Cheeky Brit blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss. Source: Channel 7 Cheeky Brit blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss 
Day dominated the under-18 100m and 200m finals at the Australian All Schools championships in December, breaking records held by Lauren Hewitt and Sally Pearson along the way. 
She is the youngest member of Australia's Nitro team. 
With her and fellow teenager Jack Hale continuing to impress, the future of Aussie athletics appears to be in safe hands. Close
